data.eml:eml: Systematic revision of Acanthodactylus busacki (Squamata: Lacertidae) with a description of a new species from Morocco

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tamar, Karin, Geniez, Philippe, Brito, José C., Crochet, Pierre-André (2017): Systematic revision of Acanthodactylus busacki (Squamata: Lacertidae) with a description of a new species from Morocco. Zootaxa 4276 (3): 357-386, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4276.3.3
